pxchat.util
Class Icons

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.util.Icons

public final class Icons
extends java.lang.Object

This class can be used to load Icons. It automatically caches the icons and thus prevents unnecessary instances of the same icon. A folder can be set to detect the icons in a specific directory.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger
See Also:

Parameters:

Returns:
The icon loaded

get

public static javax.swing.Icon get(java.lang.String icon)
Searches for an icon. If it is already cached, it is returned. If there is no icon in the internal memory, this method tries to load it by searching in the current path and in the folder set by setFolder(String).

Parameters:
icon - The name of the icon
Returns:
The icon associated with the name

setFolder

public static void setFolder(java.lang.String folder)
All icons will be searched in this folder.

Parameters:
folder - A folder name
